page.title: 09Transport in the area
page.content: The only part of this area served by public transport is on the A.35 road. This section lies on the route of the Southern National Bus Company between Weymouth and Taunton. It connects villages en route , and starting at 06.30 hours provides a more or less hourly bus service in both directions until early evening. There is no sunday Service of buses.Some transport is provided for zschool children. It must be remembered that roads in the area other than the A.35 are unsuitable for buses and that most of the adult inhabitants have their own transport.The nearest railway connections are at Axminster,9miles, Crewkerne 15m.and Dorchester 21m. The Regional Airports of Exeter and Hurn (Bournemouth) are 40m. away along the A.35 road.
